text: Decision Before Dawn is a 1951 American German World War II thriller movie directed by Anatole Litvak and is based on the 1949 novel Call It Treason by George Howe. It stars Richard Basehart, Gary Merrill, Oskar Werner, Hildegard Knef and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1952. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. * Sur l'onglet Hongrois Marianne Théoleyre Peter Mariana : Les attentats de Lyon, même organisés par un groupe d'amis et amoureux hongrois de Marianne Théoleyre, en plus des attentats et chantages contre de nombreuses entreprises et citoyens ! Le mec est sale, cultivé, puant et insouciant ! Il a un tic nerveux à cause des nuits passées dans les bars de nuit ! C'est criminel et embarrassant ! Gitane hongrois de Roumanie !!!SRI ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 movies Category:1950s thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:German thriller movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Anatole Litvak
title: Decision Before Dawn
